title: Hide Tags Component
content:
[[module CSS]]
.page-tags {
    display: none !important;
}
[[/module]]

[!-- Component info --]
[[iftags +component]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

This component hides the tag list on the page it is included on.

Usage of this component is **not** permitted without Tech approval. It may only be used on offset articles on **the first offset only**.

See the [[[Technical Content Policy]]] for information.

**Usage:**
[[div class="code"]]
@<[[include :scp-wiki:component:hide-tags]]>@
[[/div]]
[[/iftags]]
author: aismallard
